title: Barr says no need for special counsels to investigate election or Hunter Biden
Vatican OKs getting Covid-19 vaccines that used cell lines from aborted fetuses
description: Being vaccinated against Covid-19 is morally acceptable, the Vatican deemed, after some anti-abortion groups raised concerns about how the vaccines were manufactured.

title: US Navy sails nuclear submarine through Strait of Hormuz
description: The US Navy nuclear-powered guided-missile submarine USS Georgia transited the Strait of Hormuz Monday accompanied by two additional American warships, the Navy said Monday in a rare public announcement of a nuclear submarine's movements.

title: Biden receives first dose of Covid-19 vaccine on live television
description: President-elect Joe Biden received his first dose of the Pfizer and BioNTech coronavirus vaccine on live television Monday afternoon and reassured Americans of the vaccine's safety.

title: Watch The Rock and 'The Office' star save one dad's Christmas
description: Actor John Krasinski hosted a holiday special for his YouTube show "Some Good News," and it included a special appearance by Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson who helped a father in need this Christmas.

title: 'Get Back' Beatles documentary sneak peek released
description: Three-time Oscar winning filmmaker Peter Jackson and The Beatles are collaborating on an upcoming documentary film called "The Beatles: Get Back," set to be released in 2021.

title: Navarro calls out senators for getting vaccinated after downplaying pandemic
description: CNN political commentator Ana Navarro calls out several Republican senators, including Sen. Marco Rubio (R-FL), for getting the coronavirus vaccine after President Trump downplayed the pandemic.

title: Biden: Trump should get some credit for vaccine
description: President-elect Joe Biden received his first course of the Pfizer-BioNTech Covid-19 vaccine and said he did so to be a demonstration and in hopes "people will be prepared to get the vaccine."

title: Russian opposition leader Alexey Navalny was poisoned through his underpants
description: A Russian agent sent to tail opposition leader Alexey Navalny has revealed how he was poisoned in August -- with the lethal nerve agent Novichok planted in his underpants.

title: Why Indian women became the faces of these Victorian-era postcards
description: On the fronts of 19th-century postcards displayed in Caribbean shops, women in traditional Indian styles portrayed the islands as lush and exotic tourist destinations. The models posed coyly, dressed in traditional lehenga cholis garments and ornamented in elaborate gold and silver jewelry -- bell-shaped jhumkas (a classic style of earring) and all.

title: Ed Sheeran releases new song 'Afterglow'
description: Ed Sheeran fans, rejoice!

title: See Lonely Planet's Best in Travel picks for 2021
description: Lonely Planet believes travel can be a force for good, a philosophy behind their Best in Travel picks for 2021. Here are some of this year's selections.

title: Lizzo gets her mom a new car for Christmas and her reaction is priceless
description: Lizzo is spreading holiday cheer.

title: Hawaii residents told to stay home as Kilauea volcano erupts
description: The Hawaii county Civil Defense Agency (COH) has asked residents to stay indoors after the Kilauea volcano erupted following a series of earthquakes.

title: The cultural moments that defined 2020
description: It was an unusual year marked by unusual events: an unprecedented global pandemic, youth-led protest movements, impassioned Black Lives Matter demonstrations, a divisive US Election. The list goes on.

title: Cancer survivor explains why vulnerable need vaccine sooner
description: Millions of clinically vulnerable adults in the UK, some of whom only have a few months or years left to live, sit further down on the priority list for the vaccine but should they be higher up the distribution chain? CNN's Nina dos Santos reports.

title: The refugee following in the footsteps of Khabib Nurmagomedov
description: He arrived in the UK as a refugee, with no money and just the clothes in his car as his possessions.

title: 2020 was a dark year. These moments made it a bit brighter
description: From bacon-scented face masks to a parrot parroting Beyonce, CNN's Jeanne Moos recaps the oddball moments of 2020.

title: Meet the woman behind India's best bar
description: In South Delhi's upmarket Greater Kailash II neighborhood, on a street lined with coffee shops and restaurants, sits India's best bar.

title: Thailand had kept its coronavirus cases under control. Now it's testing thousands as it battles a shrimp market outbreak
description: Thailand on Sunday began testing tens of thousands of people for coronavirus and extended curbs on movement, a day after locking down a province following the country's worst outbreak yet.

title: China aims to vaccinate 50 million people ahead of Lunar New Year
Countries halt travel from UK over new Covid-19 variant concerns
description: A growing number of countries on Sunday halted flights from the UK following the discovery of a new variant of Covid-19, which is said by officials to spread faster than others.

title: Trump's talk of martial law sends White House staffers rushing to the press
Congress' pandemic relief deal buys time but seeds bitter battles ahead
description: At last.

title: Rockets fired at Baghdad Green Zone in 'terrorist act,' Iraq says
description: A rocket attack on Baghdad's diplomatic Green Zone Sunday night was "a terrorist act" that undermines Iraq's international reputation, the country's president says.

title: Winter solstice 2020: The shortest day is long on ancient pagan traditions
description: For six months, the days have grown shorter and the nights have grown longer in the Northern Hemisphere. But that's about to reverse itself.

title: Taiwan's planned submarine fleet could forestall a potential Chinese invasion for decades
description: Taiwan has begun building a fleet of state-of-the-art submarines as it looks to further bolster its defensive capabilities, a move analysts say could complicate any potential Chinese military plans to invade the island or install a naval blockade.

title: Analysis: How voters rank Trump a historically bad president
description:
• Opinion: Why Trump should resign today
• Romney on Trump: People wondering 'What in the world has gotten into this man?'

title: US to announce new criminal charges Monday in Pan Am terrorist bombing
description: In one of Attorney General William Barr's final acts leading the Justice Department, he plans to announce on Monday criminal charges against an alleged bombmaker in the terrorist bombing of Pam Am flight 103 over Lockerbie, Scotland, in 1988.
